summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Administrative Services; amending SMC Chapter 3.18.806(E) to include language inadvertently deleted in the drafting of Ordinance 116007 and to add a section H also inadvertently dropped at that time, and amending SMC 3.18.810 and SMC 3.18.826 to correct inadvertent omissions and errors which occurred in the drafting of Ordinance 116007.
